Fighting for the right to an excellent education.

for Families for Excellent Schools

Families for Excellent Schools is the organization behind the movement to ensure all kids have great schools.

Role
Project Lead, Creative Direction, Design
Team
Cottleston Pie, Patronage
Live Site
familiesforexcellentschools .com

In partnership with Patronage, we created a website to support the organization as well as the many campaigns that they run.

We built the site from the ground-up, collaborating with the organization on content-strategy and creating a flexible system that will allow the website to grow as quickly as the organization's reach.

Each campaign has a unique look & feel, so we created a modular design that allows FES to tailor each campaign section to that branding.

Cottleston Pie is led by Dave Dawson

Learn about the studio

Based out of The Works in Carroll Gardens, Brooklyn
